verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H8469>supplications:<s%> in thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me, and in thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605>man<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> be <S%H6663>justified.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> he hath <S%H1792>smitten<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> down to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> he hath made me to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H4285>darkness,<s%> as those that have been <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Therefore is my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> me is <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>

I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4480>old;<s%> <S%H6924><s%> I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6467>works;<s%> I <S%H7878>muse<s%> on the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
I stretch <S%H6566>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H413>thee:<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> thirsteth after thee, as a <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H4116>speedily,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>faileth:<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, lest I be <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in thee do I <S%H982>trust:<s%> cause me to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I should <S%H1980>walk;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from mine <S%H4480>enemies:<s%> <S%H341><s%> I flee unto thee to hide <S%H3680>me.<s%> <S%H413><s%>

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H7522>will;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H430>God:<s%> thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness.<s%>

Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for thy name's <S%H4616>sake:<s%> <S%H8034><s%> for thy <S%H6666>righteousness'<s%> sake bring my soul <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5315><s%> of <S%H4480>trouble.<s%> <S%H6869><s%>

And of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> cut <S%H6789>off<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H6887>afflict<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
